perturbation.original_text: The Joint Venture has been registered and incorporated in a Canadian jurisdiction mutually acceptable to both parties and will be referred to as the "Company", the Company shall have all the liabilities of the project in relation to finance and operation with HGF having no liability in relation to the project.
perturbation.changed_text: The Joint Venture has been registered and incorporated in a Canadian jurisdiction mutually acceptable to both parties and will be referred to as the "Venture", the Company shall have all the liabilities of the project in relation to finance and operation with HGF having no liability in relation to the project.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Company' with 'Venture' in the first part of the sentence, creating ambiguity regarding whether 'Company' and 'Venture' are the same entity later in the same sentence when assigning liabilities. This contradicts the established definition.

perturbation.original_text: To maintain all financial records of the Company and provide quarterly and annual reporting to all Company stakeholders. All records are kept under US GAAP compliance standards.
perturbation.changed_text: To maintain all financial records of the Company and provide quarterly and annual reporting to all stakeholders. All records are kept under generally accepted accounting principles compliance standards.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Company stakeholders' with 'stakeholders' and 'US GAAP compliance standards' with 'generally accepted accounting principles compliance standards'. This can introduce uncertainty as to which accounting standard, either US GAAP or general accepted principles, would apply. This creates confusion in financial reporting and auditing.

perturbation.original_text: To assist the Company in any way deemed necessary by the Company in the marketing and sales of all cash crops associated to the Primary Project both domestically and internationally.
perturbation.changed_text: To assist the Venture in any way deemed necessary by the entity in the marketing and sales of all cash crops associated to the Primary Project both domestically and internationally.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Company' with 'Venture' and 'entity'. This causes inconsistency by not specifying the proper name of the company or enterprise, leading to uncertainty in the scope of assistance required.
